text: Hi, if you're looking for access tokens then you can create those in Account Setup -> Integrations -> Private Apps:

Hi everyone! I am having a little issue today with a custom font loading correctly in the builder but not displaying when I view the page. I was wondering if anyone has experienced this with content staged pages and was able to resolve it? Would appreciate any advice! :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi all, I'm setting up a customer portal, set "anyone can register", and now wonder if there's any kind of server log somewhere?

I have linked an email sending domain, but no forgot-password emails nor verification emails seem to go be sent outâ€¦ I think the registration itself works, because if I try to re-register with a different password, I do get "this account already has signed up". Just that no verification mails seem to have been sent.
